content.title: Run the App
content.body:
In the previous hike, you could access the Account form without any credentials. Now the app will ask for login credentials.

  1. Enter the following login credentials in your app:
    • Username: john.doe@woodburn.com
    • Password: VoltMX@123
  2. Click Login.
    The Accounts list appears.
  3. Click Logout. 
    The Login form appears.
  4. To Exit the app on your mobile device, swipe two fingers from left to right or shake your mobile device and click Exit App.
